subject: Awards, Decorations and Honors
Baseball
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Davey Johnson of the Nationals and Bob Melvin of the Athletics won Manager of the Year awards on Tuesday for their roles in leading their franchises to overdue playoff berths.
snippet: Davey Johnson of the Nationals and Bob Melvin of the Athletics won Manager of the Year awards on Tuesday for their roles in leading their franchises to overdue playoff berths.
